events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified as a refund request based on the customer’s description of wanting their money back.
Support agent Sarah M. has been assigned to handle the refund case for this order issue.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. I’ve attached the photo showing the wrong item received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the case is now considered resolved on our side.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for reaching out.
